title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays text with large amounts of white space
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is positioned in the middle of the page and has a significant amount of white space around it. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays a label with a large amount of white space around it. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should position the label correctly and remove the excessive white space.
SR:
1. Load a project from the repository
2. Select a source folder
3. Open the Properties
4. Select Java Source Attachment
5. [Add any additional steps if necessary]
6. Verify that the label is vertically aligned correctly and the white space around it is reduced.
